thread.section_title: Marrakech Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Terrible soundproofing
thread.title_full: Terrible soundproofing - Review of Marrakech Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jessica H
title: Terrible soundproofing
text: I recently stayed here for 4 nights while in NYC on business. I could hear people in rooms next to me at all hours of the night as if there weren't any walls between us. There was free wifi, but it was very slow so it was difficult to do anything for work (went to Starbucks downstairs instead) and I could never get it to work on my phone. It is kept clean and had a decent bed though so if you are looking for a budget hotel this may be acceptable for you.
